title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 51.3 - Camping
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 51.3 - Camping

State Regulations

No person shall camp on lands subject to this Part except
under the written permission of the Regional Manager. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
51.3

Adopted

New

York State Register November 3, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 44, eff. 1/1/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
